attributes.action: Leave services & restrooms open for delivery drivers
attributes.background:
The services need to be open for delivery drivers,  certain companies have closed the services 
And others are stopping showers etc been available to drivers ...many of these drivers are away from home for days on end
Other companies are refusing to sell coffees etc too

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, most service stations are now providing access to shower facilities.

Decisions for individual service stations are for their operators, and not for the UK Government or Parliament.
